scripts.build: npm run build-ts && npm run build-static && npm run build-next
scripts.start: npm run build-ts && npm run build-static && npm run start-node
scripts.dev: npm run build-ts && npm run build-static && npm run start-nodemon
scripts.now: npm run build && now ./dist && now alias
scripts.tslint: tslint -c tslint.json -p tsconfig.next.json && tslint -c tslint.json -p tsconfig.server.json
